data.text: @Sophiecotsis1 @Tony_Burke @HumanAppealAus @LyndaVoltzMP @KhodrSaleh1 @RachelleHarika @ClrBilalelHayek @chriscahill A pipeline from coastal flooding prone areas at a cost of approximately $1 billion would relocate gravity fed water from coastal Queensland to Cubby station with large holding capacity. Is this not just common sense and something that we could ALL agree upon

The support from @HumanAppealAus has been incredible to thousands of people in need, including the devastation of recent bushfires   @jihaddibmp & @HumanAppealAus coordinated a convoy to reach people left with zero, to rebuild their lives. #hope #humanappeal #30yearsstrong
